input.sentences: got to work early in the morning and walked to the office .
looked out the window at the morning .
as the day went | it got hazy outside .
checked the internet connection before getting to work .
started actual work by printing some documents that came up in the copy room printer .
output.sentences: In the office building, had coffee, and was ready to star the day.
My office is like a home away from home.
The day was bright, it turned hazy.
Got lots of work done, but no network connection.
Back on the network and printed out the documents.
